cn.title: 虚拟博物馆演示
cn.teapot: 五代耀州窑青釉刻花提梁倒流壶
cn.teapot-description: 又称青釉提梁倒注瓷壶，是五代时期的瓷器，1968年出土于陕西彬县，现藏陕西历史博物馆。
cn.dongbu-description: 具有结实耐用，便于游牧携带。为蒙古民族喜用的盛奶茶及酒的器皿，现藏于中国民族博物馆。
cn.cup-description: 亦名九龙杯或戒贪杯，只要不斟满则与常杯无异。若斟得太满则酒会从底孔完全流光。
cn.bucket-description: 整体用三根编制木藤条包住木桶，外侧面与桶盖镶有打制银片包裹。现藏于中国民族博物馆。
cn.teacup: 米黄地五彩花鸟纹盏托
cn.teacup-description: 由盏、托两部分组成，清康熙年间制。现藏于中国民族博物馆。

en.title: Virtual Museum Demo
en.teapot: Yaozhou Kiln Floral Carved Celadon Bottom-filling Pot
en.teapot-description: From the five-dynasty period. Unearthed in Bin County, Shaanxi Province in 1968. Now in Shaanxi History Museum.
en.dongbu-description: By the mongolian ethnic. Durable, easy to carry wine and milk tea for nomads. Now in Chinese National Museum of Ethnology.
en.cup-description: Also known as Pythagorean cup or Greedy Cup. When it is filled beyond a certain point, a siphoning effect causes the cup to drain its entire contents through the base.
en.bucket-description: Three woven wooden rattans wrapped bucket with silver inlaided sides and lid. Now in Chinese National Museum of Ethnology.
en.teacup: Ivory-White Ground with Polychrome Floral and Bird Pattern Teacup and Saucer Set
en.teacup-description: Made during the Kangxi period of the Qing Dynasty.  Now in Chinese National Museum of Ethnology.

cn.title: 虚拟博物馆演示 - 详情页
